messages.content: Louise said: 'I've changed my vote since the last election and will be voting Labour this time. Now the Tories are back, I think we need a Labour government to fight for things that really matter.'
'I back Labour's plans to bring in tuition fees, help by freezing council tax and guaranteed apprenticeships to qualified youngsters.'

'Working people across Scotland are feeling the pinch and the last thing we need is a nationalist party distracted by separating Scotland from the rest of the UK and leaving people to pay the full price of Tory cuts.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: With Labour: Abolish youth unemployment in five years.
With Labour: Freeze the council tax.

issues.education: Many people are furious at Nick Clegg for breaking his promise on tuition fees. They promised families they would write off debt and keep up student numbers, but it hasn't happened.

contactInformation.address: Scottish Labour, John Smith House, 145 West Regent Street, Glasgow G2 4RE

quotes.text: I've changed my vote since the last election and will be voting Labour this time. Now the Tories are back, I think we need a Labour government to fight for things that really matter.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Colin Smyth, Scottish General Secretary, on behalf of the Scottish Labour Party, at John Smith House, 145 West Regent Street, Glasgow G2 4RE.
